name: Naren Ramakrishnan
content: NAREN RAMAKRISHNAN Naren Ramakrishnan VT Innovation Campus, Room 5724 3625 Potomac Avenue Alexandria, VA 22305 Email: naren cs vt edu Thomas L. Phillips Professor of Engineering Director, Sanghani Center for AI & Analytics Department of Computer Science Virginia Tech (bio) Research Interests Data science, applied machine learning, urban analytics. Quote "In science, self-satisfaction is death. Personal self-satisfaction is the death of the scientist. Collective self-satisfaction is the death of the research. It is restlessness, anxiety, dissatisfaction, agony of mind that nourish science." -Jacques-Lucien Monod Recent Publications (Click here for a full list)
